data.name: ActivatedMessageHtml.Text
data.value: Premium Data is active. Thank you.

data.name: ActivateInstructionsHtml.Text
data.value: Paste your Premium Data license key into the textbox below. Select "Activate" to use the license key with this web site.

data.name: ActivationDataInvalidHtml.Text
data.value: The data source provided does not contain valid data.

data.name: ActivationFailureCouldNotUpdateConfigHtml.Text
data.value:
The fiftyOne/detection element of the config file '{1}' could not be inserted. Please ensure the following text is present between the fiftyOne tags and try activating the license key again.


<detection binaryFilePath="~/App_Data/51Degrees-Premium.dat"/>

data.name: ActivationFailureCouldNotWriteDataFileHtml.Text
data.value: The device data file '{1}' could not be saved. Check the user '{2}' has write access to the folder, or change the folder location to one with write access.

data.name: ActivationFailureCouldNotWriteLicenceFileHtml.Text
data.value: The license file '{1}' could not be written to this web sites bin folder '{2}'. Create a text file with the extension .lic and paste the license key into the file. Save the text file in the bin folder.

data.name: ActivationFailureGenericHtml.Text
data.value: Whoops. There was a problem activating the license key. We're unsure why the license key provided could not be activated. Please Contact Us providing details of your web site implementation and we'll try and help you.

data.name: ActivationFailureHttpHtml.Text
data.value:
We were unable to reach the 51Degrees.mobi license validation web site at the host '{1}'. This could be for one of the following reasons.

  • This web site is running in medium trust mode and the originUrl attribute in the web.config does not allow access the host '{1}'. Change the originUrl to include '{1}'. Multiple host names can be separated by | signs.
  • The web servers firewall or another firewall is blocking access to the host or the SSL port 443. Check the firewall configuration.

When you've completed these checks try activating the license key again.

data.name: ActivationFailureInvalidHtml.Text
data.value: The license key provided failed validation. Please check the license key is validate with your reseller.

data.name: ActivationStreamFailureHtml.Text
data.value: The data source provided could not be read from.

data.name: ActivationSuccessHtml.Text
data.value: Success. Select the "Refresh" button to reload the web page and and start using Premium Device Data. Note: There may be a short delay as the application restarts.

data.name: Glossary.Text
data.value: * Property is included ONLY in the Premium data sets.

data.name: Introduction.Text
data.value: Below is a glossary of available properties broken out by category.

data.name: Lite.Header
data.value: Thank you for using Lite device data

data.name: LiteSearchResults.Text
data.value: Select a hardware vendor to view the device models they produce.

data.name: NoResultsFound.Text
data.value: There were no results found matching your search.

data.name: Premium.Header
data.value: Thank you for using {0} device data

data.name: PremiumIntro.Text
data.value: The {0} data contains thousands of devices, including games consoles, eBook readers, tablets, smart phones and feature phones. Each device is associated with a wide range of relevant properties, from screen size and input methods to operating system, browser and hardware.

data.name: PurchaseInfo.Text
data.value: To get the premium data, you can purchase your license from the

data.name: PurchaseInfoEnd.Text
data.value: , or upgrade to one of the Commercial Editions.

data.name: RefreshButtonText.Text
data.comment: Used to reload page after upgrade to premium.

data.name: SearchLite.Text
data.value: Enter the user agent you would like to test and click Find Device.

data.name: SearchPremium.Text
data.value: Enter your search term and press the Find Device button to search. Hardware vendor, model, device name, browser and operating system information will be searched.

data.name: UpgradePoint1.Text
data.value: Automatically redirect users to optimized web pages, enabling you to create separate sites for tablets, feature phones and smartphones.

data.name: UpgradePoint2.Text
data.value: Enhance the isMobile and Screen Size properties in Lite data with over 50 device properties including isTablet, screen size in millimeters, vendor, model, platform details, input methods and levels of JavaScript support.

data.name: UpgradePoint3.Text
data.value: Regular weekly updates of device data

data.name: UpgradePoint4.Text
data.value: An option to automatically install new updates.

data.name: UploadInstructionsHtml.Text
data.value: Alternatively upload a Premium data file using the "Browse" and "Upload" buttons below.

data.name: ValidationFileErrorText.Text
data.value: Use the Browse button to select a Premium data file to upload.

data.name: ValidationRequiredErrorText.Text
data.value: A license key must be entered.

data.name: ValidationRegExErrorText.Text
data.value: The license key must only contain upper case alpha characters or numerics.

data.name: DeviceExplorerDeviceInstructionsHtml.Text
data.value: Use the help icons to find out more information about the property or value.

data.name: DeviceExplorerModelsInstructionsHtml.Text
data.value: Select a model to view its capabilities along with the different browser and software combinations.

data.name: DeviceExplorerVendorsHtml.Text
data.value: Select a hardware vendor to view the device models they produce.

data.name: PremiumUploadError.Text
data.value: There was a problem uploading your data.
